name: Under Monitor RGB Light Bar, LED Light for Desk Gaming Setup, USB Powered Keyboard Light, 12 Inch 5V, 353 Color Change Modes, Wireless Remote, LED Ambient Lights for Room Decor, Desk Setup, PC
short_description: 🌈Great Viewing Experience: The RGB keyboard light has many nice mode settings with lots of variety, there are 353 dynamics modes and 12 static color modes. So you can do a solid color and it has various cycling effects with different color matchups giving a very broad coloring effect. Really cool light add-on to your rig!

🌈Wireless Remote ＆ Switch Control: The ambient light can be controlled from the switch on the light cable or the wireless remote. You can change speed and brightness and many modes. The remote makes choosing the lighting effect you want easy and fast. No complicated setup. You can constantly change its colors to fit the mood of you.

🌈USB Powered ＆ Memory Function: You can have the choice to plug the monitor led light bar in anywhere there's a USB or just get an outlet adapter for plugging into the wall. Works great on the original lower powered USB plugs and even works on the USB plug on the computer. Not only that, the computer led light will remember the last setting used when you turn it on again.

🌈Quick Installation: The keyboard light is small, light weight and is VERY easy to install on the place you want with the adhesive pads. The desk light bar also comes with little clips to secure the extra cord length and switch. You can install it behind your monitor for ambient lighting against the wall, and also install below the monitor to light your keyboard area. The RGB desk light creates a new vibe and feel to you at-home studio.

🌈Safe and Energy Efficient— LED means low energy/heat. The gaming light has nice black aluminum outer and thin yet sturdy. The bar light with black aluminum outer case has good heat dissipation. It will add a nice touch to your gaming area. Easy to install, nice and bright, and lots of colors to choose from!
